brokenModel.title: The Broken Model
brokenModel.content: The current philanthropy system tries to solve 21st-century problems with 19th-century tools. Donors don't know where their money goes, NGOs can't find sustainable income, and impact can't be measured.

catalyst.title: The Catalyst
catalyst.content: Bulut Labs was founded not to repair this broken system, but to rebuild it from scratch. We combine the speed and scale of tech companies with the mission of social institutions.

engine.title: The Goodness Engine
engine.content: Our vision is simple yet revolutionary: Build profitable, growing, competitive tech companies and systematically direct 51% of their profits to social good.

whatsNext.title: What's Next?
whatsNext.description: iyiligo is just the beginning. Our R&D team is working on new solutions in areas like data analytics for rare diseases and centralized support platforms for patient families. Stay tuned as we ignite the next goodness engine.

Career.title: The Hardest Problems Seek the Brightest Minds
Career.description: We don't offer salary and benefits; you'll get those anyway. We offer you a reason to get out of bed in the morning that will change the world.

whyUs.title: The 51% Constitution: Your Code's Impact Multiplier
whyUs.description: Every line of code you write here doesn't just improve a product; it increases a company's profits, and 51% of those profits are directly transferred to a foundation touching a child's life. Working at Bulut Labs means simultaneously growing your talent, our financial success, and the social impact we create. This is our 'impact multiplier'.

whoWeSeek.title: We're Looking for Like-Minded People
whoWeSeek.description: We're looking for engineers, designers, and strategists who fall in love with problems, get excited when told 'it can't be done,' and await the social impact reports of their code with more curiosity than financial reports.

JoinUs.title: Let's Code the Future Together
JoinUs.subtitle: We need you too as we build this movement. Which role would you like to play?

idea.title: IDEA

Invest.title: Invest in a Higher Purpose
Invest.subtitle: Two sides of return: Financial and Social. We maximize both.

whyStrategic.title: Why a Strategic Investment?
whyStrategic.content: Our model is not just a social responsibility project; it's a smart business strategy. A meaningful mission attracts the best talent, which means better products. A strong story creates organic brand awareness, which reduces marketing costs. Radical transparency builds unshakeable customer and partner loyalty. Investing in Bulut Labs is investing in a technology company with competitive advantage enhanced by positive impact.

cta.text: If you're an accredited investor interested in being part of a next-generation impact investment model, please contact us to request our detailed investor presentation and financial projections.
